attributes.action: To house all MP's in the same residence whilst on duty in Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To build or renovate a property near Parliament, to house the mps during the week. a form of hotel where an mp could stay whilst away from their own constituency. This would stop the recent problems of expenses, obviously this would be paid for by the tax-payer. also any mp wishing not to use the service will be deemed to be too close for benefits in supporting a second home.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
